title: 怎么用命令加一个全属性的凶险节点或饕餮节点？
author: mc_naica
txt_content: 如题 怎么用命令加一个全属性的凶险节点或饕餮节点？

replies.author: zhiwujun
replies.txt_content:
mc_naica 发表于 2020-8-9 07:23
MOD是神秘4的
如果你是服务器的话需要把give换成minecraft:give

replies.author: zhiwujun
replies.txt_content:
你可以使用命令方块指令生成器
内有神秘节点自定义功能
附本人生成的节点
凶险:/give @p Thaumcraft:BlockJarNodeItem 1 0 {Aspects:[{key:aer,amount:1},{key:terra,amount:1},{key:ignis,amount:1},{key:aqua,amount:1},{key:ordo,amount:1},{key:perditio,amount:1}],AspectsBase:[{key:aer,amount:1},{key:terra,amount:1},{key:ignis,amount:1},{key:aqua,amount:1},{key:ordo,amount:1},{key:perditio,amount:1}],nodetype:2}饕餮:/give @p Thaumcraft:BlockJarNodeItem 1 0 {Aspects:[{key:aer,amount:1},{key:terra,amount:1},{key:ignis,amount:1},{key:aqua,amount:1},{key:ordo,amount:1},{key:perditio,amount:1}],AspectsBase:[{key:aer,amount:1},{key:terra,amount:1},{key:ignis,amount:1},{key:aqua,amount:1},{key:ordo,amount:1},{key:perditio,amount:1}],nodetype:4}

replies.author: mc_naica
replies.txt_content:
